source.name: Transformative Research for Large Genome Physical Maps
source.description: The main goal of the project is to construct and utilize high-resolution genome-wide RH-based physical maps of the wheat D-genome chromosomes to facilitate the construction of sequence-ready physical maps. This research provides an unprecedented view into the evolution of cereal genomes. Importantly, the methodology is being developed to be applied to other large and complex genomes such as polyploid wheat.
